sentences.en: A successful move above this level will be very bullish.
sentences.cn: 指数运行至这一区位之上将非常看多.

sentences.en: As bullish as all this sounds , the merger stems from adversity.
sentences.cn: 这一兼并与所有这些乐观预期都诞生于危难之中.

sentences.en: At present market of our country grain is existing price bullish element.
sentences.cn: 目前我国粮食市场存在着价格上扬的因素.

sentences.en: But there a caveat on the long - term bullish outlook for commodities.
sentences.cn: 不过,就 长期 看好大宗商品前景来说,有一点需要警惕.

sentences.en: Faldo was bullish about his chances of winning a third British Open.
sentences.cn: 福尔多对于自己第三次赢得全英公开赛充满信心。

sentences.en: Foreigners tend to have two settings on China : bullish and super - bullish.
sentences.cn: 外国人对中国的态度往往分为两档:乐观和超级乐观.

sentences.en: Freight market continue bullish no chance to get same rate presently.
sentences.cn: 海运市场持续看涨,目前无法获得相同的运费率.

sentences.en: Freight reduction owner ungreed chatting freight bullish port charges increase.
sentences.cn: 船主不愿降低运费,据说运费看涨且港口费用增加.

sentences.en: He is very bullish about the prospects of his business.
sentences.cn: 他对自己企业的前景非常乐观.

sentences.en: He’s very bullish about the company’s prospects.
sentences.cn: 他对公司的前景充满信心。

sentences.en: His tone was much more bullish than our house view.
sentences.cn: 他语气上比我们银行的观点牛气好多.

sentences.en: International investors are already more bullish about China than mainland investors.
sentences.cn: 目前,国际投资者已经比内地投资者更为乐观.

sentences.en: Monday's trading action is bullish and suggesting further short - term gains.
sentences.cn: 周一的走势是看涨的,预示著 短期 还会进一步走高.

sentences.en: Ret market continue bullish no chance to get same rate presently.
sentences.cn: 海运市场持续看涨,目前无法获昨相同动费率.

sentences.en: The short, medium and long term trends are bullish.
sentences.cn: 短中长期趋势均为牛市.

sentences.en: There was a bullish trend in the market.

words.tran_cn: 大型的；公牛似的；雄性的
公牛；看好股市者；粗壮如牛的人；胡说八道；印玺

trans.tran_cn: 公牛般的，顽固的，[商]股票行情看涨的，〈比喻〉乐观的
trans.tran_en: in a business market that is bullish, the prices of  share s  are rising or seem likely to rise
